sentences: Halva ilma korral paadid merele ei lähe.
Mida te vallandamise korral ette võtate?
context: The Estonian postposition 'korral' means 'in case of,' 'when,' or 'if.' It is used to indicate a condition or circumstance under which something happens. The word appears in the adessive singular form of the noun 'kord' (time, occasion), but functions as a postposition that typically follows a noun phrase expressing the condition.
